## Resources.ResourceManager.optimizeWithDecisions() method

Analyzes collected resources and creates [AbstractDecisions](./ts-res.decisions.abstractdecision.md) for resources with similar condition set structures to enable O(1) resolution optimization.

**Signature:**

```typescript
optimizeWithDecisions(): Result<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Result&lt;void&gt;

`Success` if analysis completed successfully, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
